input.description:
Remedy alert for incident creation.
Sample:

output.from: bsara server web app name parameter
output.to: bsara server web app name parameter

output.from: bsara view run output format parameter
output.to: bsara view run output format parameter

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${success status}'='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">The incident ${incident number} is in Closed state. Aborting further execution.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${status message}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: substring(concat(., ' not managed by Bladelogic server.'), 1, 99)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet:
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">NAME ---> VALUE
</xsl:text> <xsl:for-each select="//value[substring-after(text(), '=')!=' ']"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before(text(), '=')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ---> </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="substring-after(text(), '=')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:for-each> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: substring(concat('Details for Bladelogic jobs ran on ', ., ' in the last 24 hours'), 1, 99)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Name | Job Type | Job Run Status | Start Time | End Time | User Name | Role Name </xsl:text> <xsl:text> </xsl:text> <xsl:for-each select="//value"> <xsl:variable name="string" select="current()" /> <xsl:variable name="find" select="'|'" /> <xsl:variable name="replace" select="' | '" /> <xsl:call-template name="find_and_replace"> <xsl:with-param name="string"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="starts-with($string, '[')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-after($string,'[')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="starts-with($string, ', ')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-after($string,', ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="find" select="$find" /> <xsl:with-param name="replace" select="$replace" /> </xsl:call-template> <xsl:text> </xsl:text> </xsl:for-each> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="find_and_replace"> <xsl:param name="string" select="''" /> <xsl:param name="find" select="''" /> <xsl:param name="replace" select="''" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($string,$find)"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(substring-before($string,$find),$replace)" /> <xsl:call-template name="find_and_replace"> <xsl:with-param name="string" select="substring-after($string,$find)" /> <xsl:with-param name="find" select="$find" /> <xsl:with-param name="replace" select="$replace" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$string" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.from: bsara view run output format parameter
bsara server web app name parameter

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet:
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:for-each select="//ui-object"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(@name, ' Report')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> : </xsl:text> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${https enabled}'='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">https:</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">http:</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">//${server name}/${web app}/cgi-bin/cognos.cgi?b_action=xts.run&m=portal/report-viewer.xts&ui.tool=${ui tool}&ui.object=</xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="replace-space"> <xsl:with-param name="string" select="value/text()" /> </xsl:call-template> <xsl:for-each select="static-parameters/parameter"> <xsl:variable name="name-attr"> <xsl:call-template name="replace-space"> <xsl:with-param name="string" select="@name" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="attr-value"> <xsl:call-template name="replace-space"> <xsl:with-param name="string" select="text()" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:variable> <xsl:value-of select="concat('&p_', $name-attr, '=', $attr-value)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:for-each> <xsl:variable name="server-name"> <xsl:call-template name="replace-space"> <xsl:with-param name="string" select="dynamic-parameters/server/text()" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:variable> <xsl:if test="string-length($server-name)>0"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('&p_', $server-name, '=${ci name}')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">&cv.ccurl=1&run.prompt=false&ui.action=${ui action}&run.outputFormat=${run output format}
</xsl:text> </xsl:for-each> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="replace-space"> <xsl:param name="string" /> <xsl:if test="string-length($string)>0"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($string, ' ')"> <xsl:call-template name="replace-space"> <xsl:with-param name="string" select="concat(substring-before($string, ' '), '%20', substring-after($string, ' '))" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$string" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)!='success' and string(.)!='failure'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Enriches the given incident with all associated CI information. This process only acts on Tickets with CI associations.
